com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates

Interface Template


  • public interface Template
    A template. It consists of a tree of template elements. A template should be stateless; all information regarding the processing of a template is kept in template information.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(TemplateElement templateElement)
      Determines whether this template contains a certain template element.
      List<TemplateElement> getChildren(TemplateElement templateElement)
      Finds the children of a certain template element.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this template.
      TemplateElement getParent(TemplateElement templateElement)
      Finds the parent of a certain template element.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this template.
        Returns:
        this template's name

      • contains

        boolean contains(TemplateElement templateElement)
        Determines whether this template contains a certain template element.
        Parameters:
        templateElement - the template element to check
        Returns:
        true if this template contains the given template element; false if it doesn't

      • getParent

        TemplateElement getParent(TemplateElement templateElement)
                          throws AluminumException
        Finds the parent of a certain template element.
        Parameters:
        templateElement - the template element to find the parent of
        Returns:
        the template element that's the parent of the given template element
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this template does not contain the given template element

      • getChildren

        List<TemplateElement> getChildren(TemplateElement templateElement)
                                  throws AluminumException
        Finds the children of a certain template element.
        Parameters:
        templateElement - the template element to find the children of
        Returns:
        the template elements that have the given template element as their parent
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this template does not contain the given template element
